mapper.select: select * from cn_notebook where cn_user_id=#{userId} and cn_notebook_type_id in ( select cn_notebook_type_id from cn_notebook_type where cn_notebook_type_code in ('normal') ) order by cn_notebook_createtime desc

select b.*,t.cn_notebook_type_code from cn_notebook b inner join cn_notebook_type t on b.cn_notebook_type_id=t.cn_notebook_type_id where b.cn_user_id=#{userId} and t.cn_notebook_type_code in ('favorites','recycle','action','push')
